title: Sprainter
description: Acolyte street artist MrE hates the politically and religiously oppressed dystopian so-ciety he lives in. So he uses his art and the city walls to spread messages of hope, salvation, and freedom. Ozone, a young woman with a shady past, arrives in town, offering MrE and the members of the rebellion much needed help. But when MrE is targeted for elimination by the repressive military regime that controls the city, will his efforts to reveal the truth have drastic consequences for all?
author: J.T. Therrien
